name: wb-starter
description: Modern website starter kit powered by WB Behaviors

scripts.test: npm run test:duplicates && npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
scripts.test:base: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=base
scripts.test:behaviors: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors
scripts.test:all: npx playwright test --project=compliance && npx playwright test --project=regression && npx playwright test --project=base && npx playwright test --project=behaviors && npx playwright test --project=performance

author: CieloVista Software
